item.title: Mark add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "All I know is that you can get very little from a book that is making you weep with the effort of reading it. You won’t remember it, and you’ll learn nothing from it, and you’ll be less likely to choose a book over Big Brother next time you have a choice." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Mark add a quote by Elvis Costello
item.description: "Writing about music is like dancing about architecture - it's really a stupid thing to want to do." -- Elvis Costello

item.title: Mark add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "To those leaders around the globe who seek to sow conflict, or blame their society's ills on the West - know that your people will judge you on what you can build, not what you destroy." -- Barack Obama
